SHARE Points can be redeemed in the following ways:
Link your SHARE Visa Credit Card to SHAREPay on the SHARE App
Scan your SHARE ID in-store at Majid Al Futtaim brands
Login with your SHARE credentials online at Majid Al Futtaim brands
Purchase a Digital Mall Gift Card directly on the SHARE App
